Transnational Corporation plc (ma ọ bụ Transcorp Group), bụ ụlọ ọrụ dịgasị iche iche nwere itinye ego n'ihe gbasara ile ọbịa, ọrụ ugbo na ngalaba ike. Otu ụlọ ọrụ a kpọtụrụ aha n'ihu ọha nke nwere ndị nwere òkè dị iche iche nke ihe dị ka ndị na-etinye ego pụkụ narị abụọ na ịrị itoolu

Ihe onwunwe ya ama ama gụnyere Transcorp Hotels plc (Transcorp Hilton Hotel, Abuja na Transcorp Hotel, Calabar); Transcorp Ughelli Power Limited na Transcorpi Energy Limited (onye na-arụ ọrụ na OPL 281).
E hiwere Transnational Corporation Plc na 16 Nọvemba 2004
Echiche mbụ bụ na Transcorp ga-abụ ụlọ ọrụ, yiri ụlọ ọrụ chaebol nke South Korea.

Na 30 Jenụwarị 2013, Transnational Corporation of Nigeria plc na General Electric (GE) bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta usoro iji rụkọọ ọrụ ọnụ iji dozie mkpa akụrụngwa nke Naijiria, na-ekwusi ike na ngalaba ike na njem ọkachasị ụgbọ okporo ígwè. GE, onye ndu ụwa na mmepụta, inye, ntinye na mmezi nke teknụzụ na ọrụ maka ngalaba ọkụ, kwupụtara mkpebi ya ime ka mmepụta nke 10,000MW nke ike ọzọ na Naịjirịa dị n'ime afọ iri sochirinụ n'ikwekọ na nkwekọrịta ya na Gọọmentị etiti nke Naịjirị, nke a bịanyere aka na Maachị 2012.
